recipe.ingredients: 3 cups rolled oats, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/4 cup sugar-free maple syrup or honey, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 2 large eggs, 1/4 cup melted coconut oil or unsweetened applesauce, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts or pecans, 1 cup fresh blueberries or mixed berries
recipe.directions: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9-inch square baking dish, In a large bowl, mix together the rolled oats, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, and baking powder, In another bowl, whisk together the sugar-free maple syrup or honey, unsweetened almond milk, eggs, melted coconut oil or applesauce, and vanilla extract until well combined, Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Gently fold in the nuts and berries, Spread the mixture evenly in the prepared baking dish, Bake in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the top is golden and the oatmeal is set, Allow to cool slightly before serving. Can be enjoyed warm or at room temperature.
